wordpressPost.title: Holly fuck
wordpressPost.content: Short blog today because, frankly, I'm too lazy to talk as my back is killing me for some reason … bloody gym. Anyway, in the small hours of the morning the comic for March has been released into the wild. Only a wee bit late … just some three months. There also probably will not be another update until at least October.
